exceptions¶

Created on Mon Nov 25 20:55:06 2019

@author: yoelr

exception thermosteam.exceptions.UndefinedChemical(ID)[source]¶

AttributeError regarding undefined chemicals.

exception thermosteam.exceptions.UndefinedPhase(phase)[source]¶

AttributeError regarding undefined phases.

exception thermosteam.exceptions.UndefinedPhaseOrChemical(phase_or_ID)[source]¶

AttributeError regarding undefined phases or chemicals.

exception thermosteam.exceptions.DimensionError[source]¶

ValueError regarding wrong dimensions.

exception thermosteam.exceptions.AutodocError[source]¶

RuntimeError regarding automatic documentation.

exception thermosteam.exceptions.DeprecatedAttribute(old, new)[source]¶
